name: BenzodiazepineWithdrawal
title: Benzodiazepine Withdrawal
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a diagnosis of benzodiazepine withdrawal.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of benzodiazepine withdrawal; sedative, hypnotic or anxiolytic withdrawal; or sedative, hypnotic, or anxiolytic dependence with withdrawal.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
